name: Idle Fort 3D
description:
Idle Fort is an easy-to-play brick breaker game. The most popular high-quality casual game on TikTok!

 
To get the highest score, you need to use some strategies to beat challenges of more than 50 different levels and bring rewards back. Relax and have fun to merge and break bricks!

 
Game Features:

 
**Simple control**

Enjoy the game with simple control!

 
**Automatic Shooting**

Your forts will be shooting automatically!

 
**Offline model**

Play without WIFI

 
**To be a Challenger**

Join your friends and keep pushing forward your limits!

 
**Daily Ranking Ups**

Explore the magical Level-Up world by unlocking new forts!
publishers: YOMOB INTERNATIONAL CO., LTDVistra Corporate Services Centre
